uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

is_snmp_server_enabled.description: Whether the SNMP Server is enabled.

local_engine_id.description: Engine Id for the SNMP Server (12 hex numbers separated by colons) Set the local Engine ID as ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff or 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00, to reset the SNMP Engine ID to its default value after system reboot.

listen.description: Listen Mode for the SNMP Server.
